A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Now I can say thank you for brining Star Wars back\, where episode 7 failed massively\, episode 8 really delivers. I could not predict what will happen next\, and I kept guessing\, and that was Star Wars excitement\, your in for great moments\, don’t hold back.. Send off your loudest cheers while watching ep8\, the Force is strong with this one. Note: Mark Hamill performance stole the show
